1.1.name: wordpress/eu-cookie-law-wp-cookie-law
1.1.description: WP Cookie Law is a wordpress plugin which installs instantly onto your wordpress enable website. Whenever anyone visits your site for the first time since the plugin was installed  a popup or a slide down will appear specifically asking their consent to use cookies on their machine. Within a few minutes you can be fully compliant.
